name: Vegan Banana Muffins with Streusel
description: Easy Vegan Banana Muffins with Streusel. These Soft and Fluffy Banana Bread muffin come together quickly and make for a great breakfast or snack. Add nuts, berries for variation. Vegan Soy-free Recipe. Can be nut-free.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup non dairy milk such as almond milk (,light coconut milk or oat milk)
1/4 cup maple syrup (or sugar , add 2 tbsp more sugar for sweeter if you like)
1 tsp apple cider vinegar or white vinegar
2 cups flour ((I use 1 2/3 cup all purpose and 1/3 cup whole wheat or spelt flour))
1-2 tsp spices such as cinnamon (, pumpkin pie spice or gingerbread spice)
Optional add ins: 3-4 tbsp chopped nuts (seeds)
1/4 cup coconut sugar or other sugar
2 tbsp vegan butter or oil ((add 1/8 tsp salt if using oil))

recipeInstructions.text: All all of the wet ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: All all of the wet ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1.5 cups flour and other dry ingredients to a bowl and mix well. Add blended banana mixture and mix until combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1.5 cups flour and other dry ingredients to a bowl and mix well. Add blended banana mixture and mix until combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add flour 2 tbsp at a time to make batter that is just slightly stiff.
recipeInstructions.name: Add flour 2 tbsp at a time to make batter that is just slightly stiff.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into lined muffin pan and fill to 2/3, Preheat the oven to 375 deg F (190 C).
recipeInstructions.name: Pour into lined muffin pan and fill to 2/3, Preheat the oven to 375 deg F (190 C).

recipeInstructions.text: Make the streusel: Mix the flour, sugar and cinnamon. Add in vegan butter and oil and mix to make a crumbly mixture
recipeInstructions.name: Make the streusel: Mix the flour, sugar and cinnamon. Add in vegan butter and oil and mix to make a crumbly mixture

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle liberally on the batter in the muffin pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle liberally on the batter in the muffin pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 375 deg F for 20 mins then reduce to 350 deg F (180 C), and bake for another 10 mins or so. Check with a toothpick in the center.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 375 deg F for 20 mins then reduce to 350 deg F (180 C), and bake for another 10 mins or so. Check with a toothpick in the center.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool in the pan for 10 mins then remove from the pan and cool completely lightly covered by a towel.Store: Store covered on the counter for the day. Refrigerate for upto 5 days.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool in the pan for 10 mins then remove from the pan and cool completely lightly covered by a towel.Store: Store covered on the counter for the day. Refrigerate for upto 5 days.

keywords: banana streusel muffins, easy vegan banana muffins, vegan banana bread muffins, vegan banana muffin recipe
